alert.note: Alert for Rogers; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 14 at 12:15AM CDT until August 14 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ROGERS AND NORTHEASTERN TULSA COUNTIES... At 1215 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Owasso, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Claremore... Owasso... Skiatook... Catoosa... Collinsville... Verdigris... Sperry... Turley... Tulsa International Airport... Taiwah... Tiawah... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 238 and 253. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
